preset.name: Mountain Path Lore Stone
preset.text: It is said that {item} will disguise themselves as other monsters, only to reveal themselves when battled.

preset.name: Fisherman
preset.text: Bring me {five} of those {rare seashells} and I'll give you a {category} item.

preset.name: Old Man by the Sea 1
preset.text: Hello again! Don't forget to come back here once you've found my memorial ring, alright? I'll give you a {category} reward for it, too.
preset.item_location: Horizon Beach - Old Man by the Sea

preset.name: Old Man by the Sea 2
preset.text: I think I might have dropped it {area}

preset.name: Blob Statue Guy
preset.text: I heard that there's a key for those statues {area}. You should check that out!

preset.name: Caretaker
preset.text: I tamed this Koi {area}. You might be able to find another Koi Egg there.

preset.name: Lake Guy
preset.text: She's guarded by a rare monster. I hear you can tame one for yourself {area}

preset.name: World Tree Lore Stone
preset.text: Legend tells that if one collects all three Celestial Feathers, they will be rewarded with a {category} reward.

preset.name: Forgotten World Jungle Lore Stone
preset.text: Legend tells that Krakaturtle can be found {area}

preset.name: Forgotten World Caves Lore Stone
preset.text: Legend tells that Amberlgna can be found {area}

preset.name: Forgotten World Climb Lore Stone
preset.text: Legend tells that Gryphonix can be found {area}

preset.name: Wanderer Journal
preset.text: Bards are elusive monsters whose eggs can only be found {area}

preset.name: Runestone
preset.text: We could probably find the missing fragment {area}

preset.name: Clothesmaker 1
preset.text: For that, you'll need some {Warm Underwear}, which you should be able to find {area}

preset.name: Clothesmaker 2
preset.text: Trust me! That will keep you warm even when you're at the bottom of the frozen lake.

preset.name: Clothesmaker 3
preset.text: Though what I can do is make you a {category} item, if you want it.

preset.name: Clothesmaker 4
preset.text: But I can make a {category} item even when there isn't a full moon.

preset.name: Clothesmaker 5
preset.text: You already have some Raw Hide? Well, why are we still talking then? Let me make that item for you!

preset.name: Clothesmaker 6
preset.text: If you want me to make that {category} item for you, you just need to bring me some {Raw Hide}!

preset.name: Clothesmaker 7
preset.text: You found some {Raw Hide}? And now you want me to make that {category} item for you, yes? Alright, just wait a moment!

preset.name: Clothesmaker 8
preset.text: Stay as long as you like. Or you can go and test out your new {category} item

preset.name: Cryomancer
preset.text: The {CryoMonster1} can be found {area}
